name: Infinity Run - Endless Arcade
description:
Office workers's destiny is go home.
Can you help to office workers for go home?
Can you help to ninja for avoid the dagger?
and help to baseball player for avoid the ball?
Yes we can!!!

Help them!!!

1. Touch the screen to switch to the direction, avoid the obstacles.
2. Turn the background circle halfway. To get 50 points.

There are a total of nine characters.
Collect the characters.
Each character is also different obstacles, and background!

************************************
Don’t worry the hero is not crash during the runs.
Your role is to help avoid the obstacles.
With patience you help the hero, you will be able to obtain the lot of jewelry.


Infinity run is Addictive games.
Fun and enjoy your free time!
